Module Assignment1
Package Shapes3D

Class SortingUtility

java.lang.Object
Shapes3D.SortingUtility
public class SortingUtility extends Object
A utility class that provides various sorting algorithms for arrays of 3D shapes.

    • mergeSortHelper

      private static void mergeSortHelper(Shape3D[] shapes, Comparator<Shape3D> comparator, int left, int right)
      Helper method for the Merge Sort algorithm to recursively divide and merge the array of 3D shapes.
      Parameters:
      shapes - An array of 3D shapes to be sorted.
      comparator - The comparator used to determine the sorting order.
      left - The left index of the subarray.
      right - The right index of the subarray.

    • merge

      private static void merge(Shape3D[] shapes, Comparator<Shape3D> comparator, int left, int mid, int right)
      Merges two subarrays of 3D shapes during the Merge Sort algorithm.
      Parameters:
      shapes - An array of 3D shapes to be sorted.
      comparator - The comparator used to determine the sorting order.
      left - The left index of the subarray.
      mid - The middle index of the subarray.
      right - The right index of the subarray.

    • quickSortHelper

      private static void quickSortHelper(Shape3D[] shapes, Comparator<Shape3D> comparator, int low, int high)
      Helper method for the Quick Sort algorithm to recursively partition and sort the array of 3D shapes.
      Parameters:
      shapes - An array of 3D shapes to be sorted.
      comparator - The comparator used to determine the sorting order.
      low - The lowest index of the subarray.
      high - The highest index of the subarray.

    • partition

      private static int partition(Shape3D[] shapes, Comparator<Shape3D> comparator, int low, int high)
      Partitions the array of 3D shapes during the Quick Sort algorithm.
      Parameters:
      shapes - An array of 3D shapes to be sorted.
      comparator - The comparator used to determine the sorting order.
      low - The lowest index of the subarray.
      high - The highest index of the subarray.
      Returns:
      The index of the pivot element after partitioning.

    • heapify

      private static void heapify(Shape3D[] shapes, int n, int root, Comparator<Shape3D> comparator)
      Heapifies a subarray of 3D shapes during the Heap Sort algorithm to maintain the max heap property.
      Parameters:
      shapes - An array of 3D shapes to be sorted.
      n - The size of the subarray.
      root - The root index of the subarray.
      comparator - The comparator used to determine the sorting order.
